title: Sheer Treasures
description: All items are 100% fair trade. A large selection of teas, herbs and health supplements for vegans and vegetarians are for sale. Essential oils, vegan and cruelty free shampoos and conditioners, lotions, and skin care products. 100% organic African black soap and shea butter products. You can shop the location or order online. Owners will custom order for you. A full service hair salon that operates on Thursdays and Saturdays is also on premises.
